seo.metaTitle: Pebble | Where Home Meets the Road
seo.metaDescription: Defining a new way to work, live and explore from anywhere with the Pebble Flow, an all-electric travel trailer that’s bringing an iPhone-like experience to RVing.

content.content:
It’s electric. It’s smart.
And you control it with
just a touch.
content.secondContent:
So you can
feel at home,
anywhere.

children.text: Escape to the great outdoors for up to 7 days completely off-grid. Say goodbye to generators and propane tanks. The Le Privé’s massive battery and integrated solar panels adapt to your needs, promising true freedom.
Aerodynamic design and a dual-motor Active Tow Assist System will have you wondering if you are towing anything at all. Range anxiety is a thing of the past when towing with an EV.
At home, the Le Privé is never idle. Use it as a bonus room, an office or a rental space. It can even be used as a back-up battery.

content.content:
Pebble is the all-electric trailer
designed for get-up-and-go
freedom.

items.contentText: No more fossil fuels, buzzing generators, and propane tanks. Pebble has power for days.
With one touch, the Le Privé senses, self-positions, and safely attaches to your tow vehicle.
Introducing the world’s first dual-motor Active Tow Assist System. ATAS provides extended range, unwavering confidence, and effortless towing even with an SUV or EV.

Never back up again. Once unhitched, the Le Privé is fully remote-controllable. Move around a campsite or driveway via the Pebble App, pivoting effortlessly, and positioning into tight spots with ease.
Be camp-ready in seconds, stress-free. With just one touch, watch the leveling stabilizers, stairs, thermostat and lights automatically set-up camp for you.
Panoramic windows give way to a 270° view. Convertible furniture, clever storage compartments, and minimalist, modern interior give you everything you need and the flexibility to make it your own.

content.smallPreviewTitle: The Pebble App is the remote control for your Le Privé. No manual required to get started.

content.content:
What others are
saying about Pebble

items.title: The Best Inventions: "The Le Privé is a sleek, all-electric, semi-autonomous travel trailer."
"Camp Electric: Pebble’s Futuristic Flow Trailer Can Hitch Itself"
"I Towed Pebble's Electric-Assisted Camper Trailer. It Was Enlightening"
"Le Privé EV Travel Trailer: Glamping Goes Electric"
This high-tech camper is like the iPhone of RVs
“Le Privé is providing a glimpse at how an RV designed for the EV age should function.”
“The Le Privé will debut with an Nvidia system that automates the hardest parts of RVing”
Bringing “electrification, automation and the usability of an iPhone to the RV world.”
“Think of it as a Tesla Powerwall on wheels that you can live inside part of the year.”
“The Le Privé does not resemble the rectangular, traditional boxy travel trailer, you know, the kind that tows like a brick.”
“This New All-Electric Travel Trailer Parks Itself and Sets Up Camp—So You Don’t Have to”

content.content:
True freedom
is just around the
corner.
